title: @Riot Sound team, Arcade rift music upload to soundcloud?
body: Just as it says (battle boss theme as well), and also for the upcoming star guardian mode (in queue, champ select, game proper), would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hi beany,

Audio coordinator here! I'll doing some poking. :)
what about the Galio login and the Battle Boss login?

Out of curiosity, is the sound quality of that off Soundcloud that much better than what can be ripped from the Youtube videos?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lg0e2XDfw-o

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_f0R6xJwkvU

I've done both things, but never actually bothered with checking the bitrate or doing any other analysis of the samples, as both things sounds the same on my system.

Not that I have listened for differences either - only for flaws/bad quality, of which I have found none, except when a user-error while doing ripping has been to blame (i.e. my own fault).

Hello!

So I know that YouTube compresses videos automatically for it to stream properly. I'm not 100% sure how much is lost in between the export and the upload, but it definitely exists. 

The Soundcloud upload doesn't need a video to be attached to it, so their conversions are much less and it's closer to the native export of the track. 

Hope that makes sense!

Battle Boss login is up, actually!
https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/arcade-2017-login-music

Galio login should be coming shortly as well. :)

Star Guardian to come in the upcoming weeks (after it goes onto live).
